name: gs_bot
title: Grooveshark Broadcast Bot
description: Create or takeover a broadcast with this bot, then enjoy what the bot can offer!
author: Ulysse Manceron

preferences.name: separator
preferences.title: separator
preferences.description: This string will be insered between each songs, when doing /songPreview.

preferences.name: prefixRename
preferences.title: prefixRename
preferences.description: Will try to find this string in the description of the broadcast, and write " {GS Bot} X songs left." after it. If there is no match, it will remove the entire description, so be careful

preferences.name: welcomeMessage
preferences.title: welcomeMessage
preferences.description: Place this in chat after the activation.
preferences.value: Server mode enabled. Let's take over the world!

preferences.name: defaultSongPreview
preferences.title: defaultSongPreview
preferences.description: The number of songs that will be displayed on /songPreview.

preferences.name: maxSongPreview
preferences.title: maxSongPreview
preferences.description: Since a user can do "/songPreview X" to preview X songs, we need a limit, it is defined here.

preferences.name: closeAllTabsOnStartup
preferences.title: closeAllTabsOnStartup
preferences.description: If this is checked, all grooveshark tabs will be close upon activation of the bot.

preferences.name: forceLoginUsername
preferences.title: forceLoginUsername
preferences.description: If this field is filled, the bot will try to login with this username. This is overriden by starting the bot with http://broadcast/MY_USERNAME/MY_PASSWORD . If this is blank, grooveshark will use the bot will use the current sessnion.

preferences.name: forceLoginPassword
preferences.title: forceLoginPassword
preferences.description: Same as forceLoginUsername, only this is the password.

preferences.name: whitelist
preferences.title: whitelist
preferences.description: The ID of the grooveshark users that can /guest. Separate each ID with a comma.

preferences.name: whitelistIncludesFollowing
preferences.title: whitelistIncludesFollowing
preferences.description: If checked, all the people you follow will have the ability to /guest.

preferences.name: displayAuthorNotAlbum
preferences.title: displayAuthorNotAlbum
preferences.description: If checked, seek will display the number author instead of the album.

preferences.name: blacklist
preferences.title: blacklist
preferences.description: The ID of the grooveshark user in this list will not be able to /guest, even if they are being followed by you, and if you checked whitelistIncludesFollowing. Separate each ID with a comma.

preferences.name: whiteListName
preferences.title: whiteListName
preferences.description: The rank of person in the whitelist, used when non whitelist people try to guest "Only [this name] can use that feature, sorry!"

preferences.name: doNotRenameBroadcast
preferences.title: doNotRenameBroadcast
preferences.description: If checked, the bot will NEVER be renamed with the number of tracks left.

preferences.name: historyLength
preferences.title: historyLength
preferences.description: The number of tracks that will be saved in a local "history". When playing from collection, the bot will TRY (no promises) to get a song that was not in this history.
